translations: 去内脏（eviscerate 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Dark Templars also end up eviscerating Marauders in a ruthless fashion.
sentences.translation: 黑暗圣堂无情的把掠夺者切成几块。

sentences.sentence: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent: It takes a long time to…
sentences.translation: 对你的对手使用刺骨可麻烦了：从皮革上把血渍去除要花很长时间。

sentences.sentence: Objectiv To evaluate the clinical application of orbital implant of hydroxyapatite after eyeball enucleating or eye eviscerating.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨眼球摘除或眼内容剜除羟基磷灰石义眼台植入术临床应用。
